trans-unit.source: Provides data for the events in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> control that change the position of the annotation.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs> class is used for the two annotation-positioning events, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged>, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property gets the annotation object that is being positioned.
This class also contains properties that retrieve the new location, width, height and anchor location of the annotation that is repositioned.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property allows the developer to set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation> properties during the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the new anchor location of the annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> object that represents the new anchor position.
Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point X location.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> events are raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewAnchorLocationX%2A> property determines the new X coordinate of the annotation.
This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
A `double` value that represents the new annotation anchor point X location.
Gets or sets the new annotation anchor point Y location.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewAnchorLocationY%2A> property determines the new Y coordinate of the annotation.
This information is useful when the annotation is newly anchored to a data point.
A `double` value representing the new annotation anchor point Y location.
Gets or sets the new X coordinate location of the annotation.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewLocationX%2A> property defines the X-coordinate location of the annotation.
A `double` value that represents the new X coordinate location of the annotation.
Gets or sets the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewLocationY%2A> property defines the Y-coordinate location of the annotation.
A `double` value that represents the new Y coordinate of the annotation location.
Gets or sets the new location and size of the annotation.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.RectangleF"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the new height of the annotation.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewSizeHeight%2A> property to determine the new height of the annotation.
This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
A `double` value that represents the new height of the annotation.
Gets or sets the new width of the annotation.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanging> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AnnotationPositionChanged> events are raised, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnnotationPositionChangingEventArgs.NewSizeWidth%2A> property to determine the new width of the annotation.
This information can be used when you resize the annotation.
A `double` value that represents the new width of the annotation.
